oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Three United Confederate Veterans (UCV) reunion kepis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The United Confederate Veterans often purchased kepis similar to those worn during the Civil War. These three UCV reunion kepis are made of gray wool with black lining. All three caps have the letter "B" signifying Co. B of the UCV. One cap also has; crossed rifles beneath the company letter which is the post-war insignia for infantry. These caps were collected by the United Daughters of the Confederacy, Murfreesboro (Tenn.) Chapter #91.
